CompanyName.value: Fury Gold Mines Limited Common Shares

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1630-1177 WEST HASTINGS STREET,SUITE 601, TORONTO, Ontario, V6E 2K3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Fury Gold Mines Ltd is a Canadian-focused exploration and development company strategically positioned in three prolific mining regions: James Bay, Quebec; the Golden Triangle, British Columbia; and the Kitikmeot Region Nunavut. Its projects include Eau Claire, Homestake Ridge, Committee Bay, Eleonore South JV, and Gibson MacQuoid.
